top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
Who would have thought pop-funk would translate to metal so well! The riffage! The three of you together is quite something! Making Phil Collins creepy...Hotel California... just...wow! MORE!

comments_since_last_sample.body: OMG! This zombie survival post apocalypse  horror is being beaten to death.
L’amount di epicness di questo video è outrageous!
